summary: Defines ORM-level constructs for PostgreSQL full‑text search and trigram similarity, offering classes to create, combine, and rank search queries and vectors, as well as a field type for storing tsvector data.
business_intent: Enable Django projects to utilize PostgreSQL's advanced text search features—such as full‑text search, relevance ranking, and trigram similarity—through high‑level, composable expressions and field definitions.
